title: Texas Blockchain Council including Riot file lawsuit against US Energy Department over Bitcoin miner survey
description:
Riot Platforms and the non-profit association, the Texas Blockchain Council (TBC), have initiated legal action against the US Energy Department and associated entities, such as the Energy Information Administration (EIA) and the Office of Management and Budget (OMB), concerning their recent move to survey Bitcoin miners. The Feb. 22 court filing showed that the miners […]

The post Texas Blockchain Council including Riot file lawsuit against US Energy Department over Bitcoin miner survey appeared first on CryptoSlate.

title: Is Dogecoin ($DOGE) Ready for Another Epic Price Explosion?
description: On February 23, popular crypto analyst, Ali Martinez shared his thoughts on Dogecoin’s recent price action. Dogecoin (DOGE) is a cryptocurrency that started as a lighthearted, meme-inspired project in 2013 by software engineers Billy Markus and Jackson Palmer. title: Survey Exposes AI Trust Gap, Urging Caution Among Users
description: A recent survey spanning ten African and Middle Eastern countries sheds light on the growing trend of excessive trust in generative Artificial Intelligence (AI) tools. Conducted among 1,300 respondents, the survey highlights a concerning statistic: while 83% of users express confidence in the accuracy and reliability of these AI tools, 63% are open to sharing […]

title: Exploring the Creative Mind of Hideo Kojima in a New Disney Documentary
description: A groundbreaking hour-long documentary film has been announced by Disney, set to take viewers on a captivating journey into the creative genius of renowned Japanese game designer Hideo Kojima.  Titled “Hideo Kojima: Connecting Worlds,” the documentary promises to delve deep into the visionary mind behind some of gaming’s most influential works. title: Chainlink and Solana fall, bulls turn to new meme coin
description: Chainlink and Solana are under pressure. Meanwhile, investors are turning to a new meme coin, KangaMoon, whose presale is ongoing

title: Reddit’s IPO Filing Unveils Surprising Crypto Investments: Bitcoin and Ethereum Take Center Stage
description: Reddit discloses investments in Bitcoin and Ethereum in its IPO filing, signaling a strategic move to utilize excess cash for crypto investments. Reddit’s exploration of blockchain technology includes purchases of Ether and Polygon’s MATIC for virtual goods transactions. On Thursday, February 22, the social media community platform Reddit submitted its S1 filing to the U.S. [...]

title: Cardano (ADA) Hits Highest Weekly Close Since 2022: $1 Price Target Looming?
description: Cardano (ADA) has recently created consecutive bullish weekly candlesticks as it closed above resistance. title: Retail Traders Drive Crypto Market Surge in February, JPMorgan Reports
description:
A new report from JPMorgan has suggested that retail traders have emerged as key players propelling the resurgence of the cryptocurrency market in February. Bloomberg captured details of the analysis from JPMorgan in a recent report. title: Starknet (STRK) Up 13% on Revised Token Distribution Schedule
description:
Starknet, the layer 2 scalability solution built on Ethereum, has announced a major overhaul to its STRK token unlock model. This announcement followed strong criticism by the crypto community of STRK’s initial unlock schedule.  Starknet developer StarkWare, responded to the backlash by implementing a revised schedule with a more gradual distribution of STRK tokens.
